thread.title: Bollywood celebs at Sanjay Gupta's Mata Ki Chowki
thread.title_full: Bollywood celebs at Sanjay Gupta's Mata Ki Chowki - Entertainment

author: The Centerstage Team
title: Bollywood celebs at Sanjay Gupta's Mata Ki Chowki
text:
Sanjay Gupta and his wife, Anuradha hosted a Mata Ki Chowki for his industry friends at their residence.

Nin Dusanj and Aftab Shivdasani 

Shakti Kapoor with Shivangi Kolhapure 

Sudhanshu Pandey 

(L-R) Rakesh Roshan, Sanjay and Anuradha Gupta 

Manyata Dutt

We spotted Rakesh Roshan, Manyata Dutt, Aftab Shivadasani, Praveen Dabbas, Arko Mukherjee, Vipin Aneja, Shakti Kapoor, Sudhanshu Pandey and Gulshan Grover at the divine gathering.
